mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "officeId", a.apply_user_id AS "applyUserId", a.apply_user_name AS "applyUserName", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.duration AS "duration", a.over_time_type AS "overTimeType", a.project_name AS "projectName", a.project_code AS "projectCode", a.acceptor AS "acceptor", a.job_content AS "jobContent", a.approval_status AS "approvalStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=a.apply_user_id JOIN sys_office o ON o.id=a.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO overtime_plan( id, office_id, apply_user_id, apply_user_name, start_time, end_time, duration, over_time_type, project_name, project_code, acceptor, job_content, approval_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{officeId}, #{applyUserId}, #{applyUserName}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{duration}, #{overTimeType}, #{projectName}, #{projectCode}, #{acceptor}, #{jobContent}, #{approvalStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE overtime_plan SET office_id=#{officeId}, apply_user_id = #{applyUserId}, apply_user_name = #{applyUserName}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, duration = #{duration}, over_time_type = #{overTimeType}, project_name = #{projectName}, project_code = #{projectCode}, acceptor = #{acceptor}, job_content = #{jobContent}, approval_status = #{approvalStatus}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
